items.title: Napa County Public Health Investigates First Probable Case of Monkeypox
items.summary: Napa County Public Health is reporting its first probable case of monkeypox infection in a Napa County resident exposed in a location where there is a current outbreak. The person preliminarily tested positive for monkeypox ...

items.title: Now Accepting Applications for Napa Microbusiness COVID-19 Relief Grant
items.summary:
Are you a Napa County small business owner that has been severely impacted by the pandemic? You may be eligible for a $2,500 grant if your small business: Is based in Napa CountyOpened on or before 12/31/19Revenue of $50,000 or less in 2019Has zero to 5 emp...
